entry.title: The Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: The Work Tote
Price: 128.00

Description

OOO?!? No worries, you'll never be too far from paradise or your email with this on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag, bag! We designed this bag (selfishly) because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 16.75"W x 13.5"H x 7"D Materials: Exterior - Croc Embossed Vegan Leather

Laptop Sleeve: 13.5"W x 11"H

Lining - 100% Polyester Hardware - Zinc Alloy

Care: Spot Clean

Weight: 2.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket
INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure 13.5"W x 11"H
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Tote Insert
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 58.00

Description
While our original thoughts when designing this diaper bag insert were for Mums who want all the organization but to still keep their stylish bags - we realized while testing - just how amazing it is for everyone. Especially to keep that tote you're traveling with organized and in a pinch take out the insert and use the tote for shopping, a beach day, and an extra bag on-the-go! Designed to give you the absolute MOST organization, The Tote Insert, has an abundance of pockets, a padded laptop sleeve, our token key fob, a microsuede lined pocket for sunglasses, and a removable insulated bag for milk, snacks, your lunch, or a refreshing beverage.
Shay's Inspo

"I’ve really outdone myself with this one! Can I say that? Meet the Tote Insert. This is perfect for people who like to switch up their bags every now and again, but who don’t want to go through the rigmarole of taking everything out over and over. This bag ensures that all of your essentials are with you no matter what (BÉIS) bag you want to use."-Shay

Details


A POCKET FOR EVERYTHING

With this diaper bag organizer, there are endless ways to create the perfect way to organize all your baby's and your needs.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY

Regardless if you're going on a long trip or from the couch to the counter - this diaper bag insert makes the perfect companion to keep everything organized in your tote and everywhere in between!

ADAPTABLE

Make any tote bag a diaper bag for anyone who loves to have it all together. Padded Laptop Sleeve: 14.25" W x 9.25" H; Fits most 15" laptops

entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 28.00

Description
A stylish way to protect your laptop - L-zip closure, a few extra pockets and a sleek design that holds up to a 16" laptop.

Weight: 1lb

-large exterior slip pocket
INITERIOR
- padded sleeve
- fits up to a 16" laptop
- 2 pen slips
- 1 interior slip pocket

entry.title: The Crossbody Wallet in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

A compact crossbody fit with all the components of a great wallet. Flap closure with full-body zip compartment - plenty of slots for all the cards, slip pockets, zip pockets a loop for a pen (BEIS pen also included) and a strap to carry it all around!
Shay's Inspo

Dims: 8.5 x 1.5" x 5.5"
Body - Faux Leather/PU
Lining - Polyester
Strap - Faux Leather/PU
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1lb
Details

EXTERIOR
- easy to clean faux leather
- embossed BÉIS logo
- removable adjustable crossbody/shoulder strap
- exterior slip pocket
INTERIOR
- 6 CC slip pockets
- currency pocket (fits large bills)
- long zip pocket
- pen loop & pen
PERFECT FOR
-Travel
-Everyday use
-Makes a great gift
-Small bag

entry.title: The Messenger in Black Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description

Did you know some people pack light?! If you are a fan of this brand you know we love a big bag, but some people are just so good they know how to get by with just the right amount of items, only the essentials - that's why and how this black messenger bag was created. A padded compartment for a laptop, a zip pocket with a couple of organizational slip pockets, pen slips, two ways to carry, and a trolley passthrough. This faux leather messenger bag is sleek and effortless simplicity at its best.
Specifications

Dims: 13.5 x 1.5" x 9.5"
Body - Faux Croc PU & Faux Leather/PU, Lining - Polyester & Mircofiber, Strap - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- the perfect size laptop & work bag for just the essentials
- main body is neoprene padded compartment for holding up to a 13" laptop or tablet
- front compartment has two slip pockets and 2 pen pockets & key fob
- top handle for carrying in hand or at the crook of your arm
- removable adjustable shoulder strap to carry on your shoulder or crossbody
- custom hardware: d-rings & bar-turnlock closure
- large back, exterior slip pocket
- trolley sleeve
PERFECT FOR
Everyday Work
Days Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Mini Work Tote in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 108.00

Description

Remember when you said The Work Tote was too big, well enter it's mini-me. The Mini Work Tote is just like the original in a more compact silhouette, it's like a tiny house, if a house could be an on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag! We designed the original because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all our out-of-office adventures. This version was designed for you, by you! This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 14.25" W x 11"H x 6"D Materials: Body - Faux Croc PU Lining - Polyester

Laptop Sleeve: 12.5"W x 9"H

Strap - Polyester Care: Spot Clean
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket
INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure (12.5"W x 9"H)
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Diaper Bag in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 168.00

Description

The anti-diaper diaper bag, a shoulder bag with plenty of room and function to tote around all your baby-mama essentials and chic enough that NO ONE will ever suspect you're carrying around a week old dirty diaper! Complete with every essential needed for that dreaded diaper change; changing pad with a zippered pocket for an extra diaper and baby wipes, an odor-proof pouch, a teething ring to keep the baby from squirming and a pacifier pouch to easily reach that must have plug! And there's MORE! This baby comes with 4 different sets of interchangeable straps; stroller straps, an adjustable shoulder strap, 2 flat shoulder straps and chain straps for when you're feeling fancy! Still not sold? Take this stylish diaper bag for a spin, literally - just click here.

Specifications

Dims: L: 19" W: 7" H: 14"
Materials: Nylon Twill, Poly lining, Water resistant protective finish, Brushed, Gold Hardware, Vegan Buffalo Leather Trim
Care: Spot Clean, Dry Flat
Weight: 4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- 5 Exterior pockets(2 slips, 2 slips with magnetic closure, 1 zip) (one pocket to hold changing pad
- trolley sleeve with option to use as zip pocket
- Removable/Interchangeable padded shoulder strap
- Removable/Interchangeable padded chain strap
- Removable/Interchangeable adjustable strap with shoulder pad
- Breakaway zipper for easy access to interior
- snaps on sides to reduce/expand size
- Metal feet on bottom to protect from wear & tear
INTERIOR
- Removable stroller straps
- Tabs for stroller caddy (sold separately)
- Key Fob
- pacifier pouch included
- Odor Proof bag (for dirty diapers/clothing)
- Portable changing pad with slip pocket for diapers & wipes
- Teething ring
- Insulated drawstring pocket for bottles
- padded Laptop sleeve with magnetic closure
- 2 large slip pockets
- 1 large zip pocket
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Pen Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: pen set
Price: 8.00

Description

You always need a pen handy for when inspiration strikes! To write it down, doodle it out or just to keep handy for filling out those forms at customs! 
Shay's Inspo

“A doodle on an airplane napkin turned into a business plan, I always have a pen for when inspiration strikes!” —Shay
Details

TWO PENS
One for you, one for when you lose the first one!
BLACK INK
For signing all the important docs, or doodles.
GIFTABLE
This box doesn't even need a bow.
